text: Ceroplesis hottentotta is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Johan Christian Fabricius in 1775. It is known from South Africa.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis hottentotta. Retrieved 8 September 2014. It contains the variety Ceroplesis hottentotta var. disjuncta. ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1775
title: Ceroplesis hottentotta
